scripts.db:migrate: dotenv -e .env -- node-pg-migrate up --migrations-table novellum_mgmt.pgmigrations --schema novellum_mgmt --database-url-var DATABASE_URL
scripts.db:migrate:up: dotenv -e .env -- node-pg-migrate up --migrations-table novellum_mgmt.pgmigrations --schema novellum_mgmt --database-url-var DATABASE_URL
scripts.db:migrate:down: dotenv -e .env -- node-pg-migrate down --migrations-table novellum_mgmt.pgmigrations --schema novellum_mgmt --database-url-var DATABASE_URL
